Text: OhGr:  Ogre noted that this direction was inspired by the pop bands he enjoyed as a child, such as The Archies.

Text: OhGr:  However, from "Devils in my Details" onwards, ohGr has taken to a more abrasive, non-linear flavour of electro-industrial.
